lines.text:
[Voiceover as searchers are looking for corpse in the river]
I'm the body they're looking for.

[to reporter]
A good caning might teach you a decent respect for grief.

[Authoritatively to Clark]
You're general manager of my mills, Selden, not general manager of my family.

[as they are driving to their honeymoon cabin]
Things at the mill being what they are, this isn't gointg to be the fanciest honeymoon in the world.
Don't worry, Darling; I take my honeymoons as they come.
